answers.answer: Not Diabetic related that I'm aware of.  Time to see a MD for sure.
Two things you can do:1. Google search Melanoma.2. Call a doctor for an appointment. We cannot see or evaluate a condition like this over the inet, only a doctor first hand.

question: My husband has diabetes type 2, that is under control, but he shaved his head about 20 days ago and believed that his head was scraped. After a few days and a repeated scab, this soar has now become painful, highly irritating and turned into a lump that went from being the size of a golf ball to the size of a tennis ball.
title: Lump Head
